resources.string: This app in it\'s entirety has been designed, and developed by John Walter Stockwell. Any questions, comments, concerns, criticisms, or funny cat pictures should be directed to:

This app claims no association with the individuals, or owners of the website TeamFortress.tv and claims no ownership of the content provided by that website. As a viewer app, the intention of this app is to simply make viewing the website easier than it would otherwise be.
